def_en: If someone or something is a clone of another person or thing, they are so similar to this person or thing that they seem to be exactly the same as them.

def_cn: 克隆动物(或植物);无性繁殖动物(或植物)
def_en: A clone is an animal or plant that has been produced artificially, for example in a laboratory, from the cells of another animal or plant. A clone is exactly the same as the original animal or plant.

def_cn: 克隆;以无性繁殖技术复制
def_en: To clone an animal or plant means to produce it as a clone.
